S08n2856:26: oṃ phaṭ ity uccārayan krodhamuṣṭiṃ hṛd-ūrṇā-mūrddhasu vinyasya mukha-śaucādikaṃ
S08n2856:27: kṛtvā deva-gṛhaṃ praviśya paṭādi-gata-mūrttiṃ bhagavatīṃ avatāryya mārīcī-vighnotsāraṇa-mantreṇa
S08n2856:36: vighnot-sāraṇa-mantraḥ oṃ mārīcyai huṃ sarvva-vighnān utsāraya huṃ phaṭ | tataḥ
S08n2856:37: svahṛdayakṣareṇa niśi candra-maṇḍalaṃ divā sūryya-mandalaṃ ā-kāreṇa dhyātvā
S08n2856:42: tate viśva-raśmīn niścāryya tai raśmibhir niṣpannāṃ
S08n2856:43: bhagavatiṃ mūrddhni guru-buddha-bodhisattvāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā pūjayitvā abhivandya ca
S08n2856:44: anena mantreṇa oṃ mārīcyai puṣpaṃ pratīcca svāhā ,
S08n2856:67: ābodheḥ śaraṇaṃ yāmi buddhaṃ dharmmaṃ guṇottamam ,
S08n2856:108: dṛśyate spṛśyate caiva yathā māyā hi sarvvataḥ ,
S08n2856:112: na copalabhyate caiva sarvvasya jagataḥ sthitiḥ |
S08n2856:122: sarvva-dharmmāḥ sva-bhāva-śudho'ham iti vāra-trayam uccāryya tataḥ pūrvvokta-bīja-niṣpannaṃ
S08n2856:123: candraṃ tasyopari oṃ-kāraṃ tat sarvvaṃ pariṇamya śrīmad-vairocana-nāthaṃ
S08n2856:133: pañca-viṃśatikam akṣaraṃ paramahṛdayaṃ prathamasya dvitīyena samā-yuktaṃ
S08n2856:135: candra-stha-mā-kāraṃ dhyātvā tat sarvvapariṇatam ātmānaṃ mārīcī-rūpeṇa bhāvayet
S08n2856:136: aham eva mārīcī bhagavatī iti su-pītāṃ jāmbhū-nada-prabhākārāṃ dīpta-dehāṃ caitya-garbha-sthāṃ
S08n2856:152: vairocana-kṛta-mūrddha-jāṃ aśoka-mālā śirasi bhuṣitāṃ vāma-karair akṣasūtrāśoka-cāpa-dharāṃ
S08n2856:157: bhayasyāpi bhayaṅkaraṃ dakṣiṇa-mukhaṃ su-raktaṃ divya-jvalad-bhāsuram iva ,
S08n2856:159: śirasi vairocanaṃ nāthaṃ pūrvvokta-varṇa-mudropetam adhaḥstāt sapta-śukara-ratha-gatāṃ
S08n2856:166: ha-kara-pariṇataṃ rāhu-grahaṃ hastābhyāṃ grastaṃ candra-sūryyau divā dinakaraṃ
S08n2856:174: tatra pūrvvena oṃ mārīcyai varttāli vadāli varāli
S08n2856:175: varāhamukhi siddhim ākarṣaya jaḥ svāheti evaṃ devīṃ rakta-varṇāṃ varāhaikamukhīṃ
S08n2856:176: catur-bhujāṃ rakta-kañcukottarīyāṃ vāme pāśāśoka-hastāṃ dakṣiṇe vajrāṅkuśa-sūci-dharāṃ
S08n2856:184: oṃ mārīcyai varttāli vadāli varāli varāhamukhi
S08n2856:185: sarvva-duṣṭa-praduṣṭānāṃ mukhaṃ bandha bandha huṃ svāhā |
S08n2856:187: pīta-varṇāṃ vāme paśa-vajra-dharāṃ dakṣiṇe pallava-sūcī-dharāṃ duṣṭānāṃ
S08n2856:195: oṃ mārīcyai varttāli vadāli varāli varāhamukhi
S08n2856:196: sarvva-duṣṭān stambhaya va svāheti varālīṃ devīṃ tadvat vastrābharaṇa-varṇaṃ
S08n2856:218: oṃ mārīcyai varttāli vadāli varāli varāhamukhi
S08n2856:219: sarvva-satvtān me vaśam ānaya hoḥ svāheti varāha-mukhīṃ devīṃ rakta-varṇāṃ tathā-vastrābharaṇaṃ
S08n2856:220: ca savyena vajra-śara-dhāriṇīṃ vāme aśoka-cāpa-dharāṃ sarvva-sattvān
S08n2856:230: jñāna-sattvarn ākṛṣya praveśya baddhvā vaśīkṛtya sādhayet |
S08n2856:237: oṃ vajrāṅkuśi jaḥ ity anena jñāna-sattvam ākṛṣya
S08n2856:243: bandhayet , oṃ vajrāveśa hoḥ anena toṣayet |
S08n2856:271: eṣā mudrā varā śreṣṭhā sarvva-karmmasu yojayet ,
S08n2856:290: iti mūrddhni sthāpya oṃ bhūḥ kha mā abhiṣiṅceti
S08n2856:291: mantreṇa vairocanaḥ kanakābho bodhyaṅgy-avasthitaḥ śirasi dhyeyah |
S08n2856:294: sva-hṛdi candra-sthaṃ mantraṃ dedīpyamānam oṃ mārīcyai svāheti dṛṣṭvā
S08n2856:328: sarvva-karmmasu ca me cittam śreyaḥ kuru ,
S08n2856:338: visarjjana-kāle tu sarvvam etat kuśalaṃ pariṇamya
S08n2856:339: abhipretāṃ siddhim abhiyācya sva-mudrāṃ śirasi muṅcet oṃ mārīcyai mur iti |
S08n2856:348: ity anena krameṇa kāya-vāk-citta-rakṣāṃ kṛtvā yathāsukhaṃ
S08n2856:361: oṃ kha kha khādi khādi gṛhṇa gṛhṇa gṛhṇantu sārvva-bhautikā
S08n2856:362: baliṃ mama śāntiṃ kurvvantu svāheti bali-mantraḥ
